page.title: 01OUR VILLAGE
page.content: Our part of the Domesday Project involves us surveying an area which is mainly open countryside but which also contains a number of small villages. These villages are Staple Cross, Hockworthy,Burlescombe,Westleigh and the village where our school is which is called Holcombe Rogus.In addition there are a number of scattered tiny communities which are based on farms, some of which are rather isolated. However we do not feel that we live "in the wilds" and we like living here very much.I think that we know every body who lives in the area and many of us are related in some way although quite a lot of new people have moved into the village in recent years.
